content: TEL AVIV/BERLIN  Oct 30 Germany's Continental AG is in advanced talks to buy Israel's Argus Cyber Security  whose technology guards connected cars from hacking  for about $400 million  Israeli media reported on Monday.
name: Amdocs Limited
title: UPDATE 1-Continental in talks to buy Israeli autos cyber firm Argus -reports

content: OSLO  Nov 26 Norwegian offshore supply vessel owner World Wide Supply will not be able to make a scheduled interest payment on its debt on Nov. 27  the shipping firm said on Thursday.
name: Amdocs Limited
title: Norway's World Wide Supply says unable to make debt interest payment
